Trade/Device Name(s): Optilite High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Kit
Optilite® High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Optilite High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein Kit, a quantitative immunoturbidimetric assay for measuring C-reactive protein in serum using the Optilite analyser.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative in vitro measurement of C-Reactive Protein in serum to evaluate conditions associated with inflammation in otherwise healthy individuals, used with other laboratory and clinical findings.
